title._content: Image taken from page 8 of 'Prospectus and Specimen of an intended National Work by William and Robert Whistlecraft ... Intended to comprise the most interesting particulars relating to King Arthur and his Round Table. [By John Hookham Frere.]'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Prospectus and Specimen of an intended National Work by William and Robert Whistlecraft ... Intended to comprise the most interesting particulars relating to King Arthur and his Round Table. [By John Hookham Frere.]" Author: WHISTLECRAFT, William - and WHISTLECRAFT (Robert) pseud Contributor: FRERE, John Hookham - Right Hon Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 11650.ff.75." Page: 8 Place of Publishing: Bath Date of Publishing: 1842 Publisher: H. E. Carrington Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003904608 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here.
